short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a new tab with a simple spreadsheet interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides a lightweight, browser-based spreadsheet that mimics basic functionality of an Excel sheet. Designed for quick data entry and management, it allows users to interact with a table grid layout and input data directly in the browser. The extension is simple, responsive, and perfect for anyone looking for a no-frills spreadsheet experience without the need for additional software.
